name: Assisted Living Services
description: Our Assisted Living Services provide personalized care and support for seniors who need help with daily activities but want to maintain their independence. We offer 24/7 nursing assistance, medication management, and meal planning, ensuring comfort and dignity.
features: Daily meal preparation and nutrition support

name: Private Duty Services
description: Our Private Duty Nursing services are designed to provide one-on-one medical and personal care in the comfort of your home. Ideal for patients recovering from surgery, chronic illness, or needing continuous medical supervision.

name: Colostomy Bag Change
description: Our professional caregivers provide safe and hygienic colostomy bag change services to ensure patient comfort, infection prevention, and overall well-being. We maintain the highest standards of cleanliness and discretion.
features: Training for family members if required

name: Personal Care Services
description: Personal Care Services are designed to assist individuals with essential daily routines, including bathing, grooming, and mobility support, ensuring they maintain dignity and independence.

name: Elderly Care Services
description: Our Elderly Care Services focus on promoting health, comfort, and companionship for seniors. We offer tailored care plans that address physical, emotional, and social needs, allowing your loved ones to live with dignity.

name: Babysitting Services
description: Our Babysitting Services ensure that your child receives attentive care and supervision in a safe and nurturing environment. Our trained caregivers focus on safety, engagement, and fun activities.
